name: Abduh
text: Markay Qiyaamadu dhacdo.

name: Abduh
text: Dhiciddaas wax beenin ma jiro (markay arkaan).

name: Abduh
text: Waana (mid) hoos u dhiga kor u dhiga ah.

name: Abduh
text: Marka la gilgilo Dhulka gilgilid.

name: Abduh
text: Buurahana la riqdo.

name: Abduh
text: Oy noqoto boodh Firdhisan.

name: Abduh
text: Ood ahaataan Saddex nooc, (markaasaa dadka la soo bixin).

name: Abduh
text: Kuwa midigta mari (waa Ehlu-Jannehee), ma taqaan kuwa midigta mari.

name: Abduh
text: Iyo kuwa bidixda mari (waa ehluNaarkee) ma taqaan kuwa Bidixda mari.

name: Abduh
text: Iyo kuwii aad u hormaray.

name: Abduh
text: Waa kuwa Eebe dhaweeyay.

name: Abduh
text: Waxayna gali Jannooyin Nicma leh.

name: Abduh
text: Waana Koox ka mid ah kuwii hore.

name: Abduh
text: Iyo wax yar oo ka mid ah kuwii dambeeyay.

name: Abduh
text: Sariiro Dahab laga sameeyay yayna ku sugnaan.

name: Abduh
text: Oy kuna dangiigsan korkeeda iyagoo is qaabili.

name: Abduh
text: Waxaa la dhex wareegi wiilal waari.

name: Abduh
text: Koobab iyo kildhiyo iyo weel uu ka buuxo macaan socda.

name: Abduh
text: Madax xanuun iyo caqlitagid midna ma leh.

name: Abduh
text: Faakihaday «khudaartay» doonaanna way heli.

name: Abduh
text: Iyo Hilib Shimbir oo kay rabaan ah.

name: Abduh
text: Iyo Haween Janno oo Indha cadcad.

name: Abduh
text: Ood mooddo Jawhar la ilaaliyay.

name: Abduh
text: Waana abaalmarin waxay Camalfali jireen (oo wanaag ahaa).

name: Abduh
text: Kumana maqlaan Jannada hadal micno darra iyo dambi midna.

name: Abduh
text: Waxayse ku Maqli Salaan (dhexdooda ah).

name: Abduh
text: Kuwa Midigta mari, Ma taqaan kuwa midigta.

name: Abduh
text: Waxay heli Geedka Sidriga ah oon Qodax lahayn.

name: Abduh
text: Iyo Geedka Dhalxiga ah oo buuxa.

name: Abduh
text: Iyo Hoos joogta ah.

name: Abduh
text: Iyo Biyo socda (goor walba).

name: Abduh
text: Iyo Faakiha badan.

name: Abduh
text: Oon la goynaynin lana reebaynin.

name: Abduh
text: Iyo Gogol la koryeelay.

name: Abduh
text: Annagaa ahaysiin (Da'yarayn Haweenka Jannada).

name: Abduh
text: Kana dhigi kuwa aan la taaban.

name: Abduh
text: Oy is jecelyihiin (Raggooda) simanna.

name: Abduh
text: Liwa Midigta yaa muta (arrintaas).

name: Abduh
text: Waana Koox kuwii hore ka mid ah.

name: Abduh
text: Iyo Koox kuwa dambe ka mid ah.

name: Abduh
text: Kuwa Bidixda mari, ma taqaan kuwa Bidixda.

name: Abduh
text: Waxay ku sugnaan Naar daran iyo Biyo kulayl badan.

name: Abduh
text: Iyo hoos madow oo wax guba.

name: Abduh
text: Aan qaboobayn aragna fiicnayn.

name: Abduh
text: Waxay ahaayeen arrintaas ka hor kuwo ku raaxaysta (Xumaanta).

name: Abduh
text: Waxayna Daa'imi jireen dambi wayn.

name: Abduh
text: Waxayna dhihi jireen ma markaan dhimanno oon Lafo iyo Carro noqonnaa lana soo bixin.

name: Abduh
text: Ama Aabayaalkannagii horeeyay.

name: Abduh
text: Waxaad dhahdaa kuwii horeeyay iyo kuwii dambeeyayba.

name: Abduh
text: Waxaa loo soo kulmin Maalin la yaqaan (Qiyaamo).

name: Abduh
text: Markaas Baadiyaalyahow Beeniyayaasha ah.

name: Abduh
text: Waxaad wax ka cunaysaan Geed xun.

name: Abduh
text: Aad kana buuxinaysaan Caloosha.

name: Abduh
text: Waxaadna ku cabbaysaan Biyo kulayl badan.

name: Abduh
text: Waxaadna u cabbaysaan sida Geel aad u ooman.

name: Abduh
text: Kaasina waa waxa lagu soori (Gaalada) Maalinta abaalmarinta (Qiyamada).

name: Abduh
text: (Eebe wuxuu yidhi) Annagaa idin abuurraye maxaad la rumaynwaydeen (soo bixinta).

name: Abduh
text: Ka warrama Dhibicda aad tuuraysan «Manida».

name: Abduh
text: Ma idinkaa abuura mase Annagaa abuurra,

name: Abduh
text: Annaaa idinku eheynay Geerida, Ruux naga fakanna ma jiro.

name: Abduh
text: Inaan idinku baddallo kuwo idin la mid ah oon idinka ahaysiinno waxaydaan aqoon.

name: Abduh
text: Dhabahaanbaad u ogtihiin abuuriddii hore, maad wax xusuusataan.

name: Abduh
text: Ka warrama waxaad beereysaan.

name: Abduh
text: Ma idinkaa soo dhaliya mase Annagaa soo dhalinna.

name: Abduh
text: Haddaan doonno waxaan ka dhigaynaa burbur (aan wax tarin) markaasaad yaabaysaan (murugoonaysaan).

name: Abduh
text: (Idinkoo dhihi) Waa nala khasaariyay.

name: Abduh
text: Mase waa nala hoojiyay.

name: Abduh
text: Ka warrama Biyahaad cabbaysaan.

name: Abduh
text: Ma idinkaa ka soo dajiyay Daruurta mase annakaa soo dajinnay.

name: Abduh
text: Haddaan doonno waxaan ka yeelaynaa khadhaadh (aan la hollin karin) ee maad ku mahadisaan (Eebe).

name: Abduh
text: Ka warrama Dabkaad Madagta ka shiddaan.

name: Abduh
text: Ma idinkaa ahaysiiyay Geedkeeda mase annagaa ahaysiinnay.

name: Abduh
text: Annagaa ka dhignay Dabka waano iyo nacfiga kuwa Safarka ah (iyo cidlada).

name: Abduh
text: Ee waynee oo u Tasbiixso Magaca Eebaha wayn.

name: Abduh
text: (Eebe wuxuu yidhi) Waxaan ku dhaartay halkay Xiddiguhu ku dhacaan (ku qarsoomaan).

name: Abduh
text: Waana dhaar wayn haddaad ogtihiine.

name: Abduh
text: Quraanku waa shay sharaf leh.

name: Abduh
text: Wuxuuna ku suganyahay Kitaab la dhawray.

name: Abduh
text: Mana taabto Ruuxan Daahir ahayn.

name: Abduh
text: Waxaana soo dajiyay Eebaha Caalamka.

name: Abduh
text: Ee ma Quraankan yaad beeninaysaan.

name: Abduh
text: Ood ka yeeleysaan (mahaddii) Riqigiinna beenin (Xaqa).

name: Abduh
text: Maxaydaan markay Naftu dhuunta gaadho.

name: Abduh
text: Idinkuna aad fiirinaysaan (Ruuxa dhiman).

name: Abduh
text: Annaguna aan idiinka dhawnahay, Laakiinse aydaan arkaynin.

name: Abduh
text: Haddaad tihiin kuwa aan la soo bixinaynin.

name: Abduh
text: Maad Nafta ku celisaan, haddaad Run sheegaysaan.

name: Abduh
text: Hadduu ka mid yahay (Ruuxa dhiman) kuwa Eebe dhaweeyay.

name: Abduh
text: Wuxuu heli naxariis iyo farax iyoJannada Naciima.

name: Abduh
text: Hadduu yahay kuwa Midigta marina.

name: Abduh
text: Nabadgalyaa u sugnaatay (iyo wanaag).

name: Abduh
text: Hadduu yahay kuwa xaqa beeniyay ee dhumayna.

name: Abduh
text: Wuxuu heli martiqaad iyo kulaylbadan.

name: Abduh
text: Iyo galidda Naarta Jaxiimo.

name: Abduh
text: Waxaad (la soo sheegay) waa run dhab ah.

name: Abduh
text: Ee tasbiixso Magaca Eebaha wayn.
